name: Cavern Chaos
overview: Cavern Chaos is a standard text adventure for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. It was released by 5D Software Services in 1985. Plot: The survivors of a neutron war have formed a new type of society in which young men must complete a task when they come of age. Today is your turn, you must enter some recently discovered caverns and recover a long-lost treasure, the nature of this treasure is unknown.
